summary.span: 使用 物件的 或 存取子，提供該物件的屬性值存取。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項應該有其設`true`及其設`false`用戶端會嘗試呼叫之前。A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` before the client attempts a call to . ## Examples 在下列範例中，支援控制項模式沒有其設為使用者指定的值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its set to a user-specified value. [!code-csharp[UIAValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
The value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element as a string.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單行編輯控制項支援以程式設計方式存取透過其內容。Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents through . 不過，不支援多行編輯控制項控制項模式。However, multi-line edit controls do not support the control pattern. 擷取的文字內容的多行編輯的控制項的控制項必須支援控制項模式。To retrieve the textual contents of multi-line edit controls the controls must support the control pattern. 不過，不支援設定控制項的值。However, does not support setting the value of a control. 不支援擷取格式設定資訊或子字串值。 does not support the retrieval of formatting information or substring values. 必須在下列案例中使用控制項模式。The control pattern must be used in these scenarios. ## Examples 在下列範例中，取自目標控制項的物件會傳遞至函式，擷取目前屬性值。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values. [!code-csharp[UIAValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAValuePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAValuePattern_snippets.vb#102)]
